Name: apmonitor微服务接口文档

AllItems.Return:
{
    "count_left":"int,剩余数量",
    "count_total":"int,总数",
    "apList":[
        {
            "macAddr":"string,AP MAC",
            "apName":"string,AP名称",
            "apSN":"string,AP序列号",
            "status":"int,ap状态,1-在线,2-离线,3-版本下载",
            "apModel":"string,ap型号",
            "radioNum":"int,radio 数",
            "ipv4Addr":"string,AP IPv4地址",
            "ipv6Addr":"string,AP IPv6地址",
            "softVersion":"string,版本号",
            "apType":"int,0-手工，1-自动",
            "apAuthState":"int,0-未认证,1-认证OK,2-认证failed",
            "apGroupName":"string,组名",
            "timeStamp":"int,时戳",
            "transmitTraffic":"double,上行流量",
            "receiveTraffic":"double;下行流量",
            "transmitRate":"int,上行速率",
            "receiveRate":"int,下行速率",
            "cpuRatio":"int,cp占有率",
            "memoryRatio":"int,内存占有率",
            "onlineTime":"date,在线时长(s)",
            "packLostRatio":"int,包丢失率",
            "uniqueKey":"string,约束键",
            "branchName":"string,所属分支",
            "client5GNum":"int,5G客户端数量",
            "client24GNum":"int,2.4G客户端数量",
            "radioList":[
                {
                    "radioId":"int",
                    "radioMode":"string,radio物理模式，5G、2.4G",
                    "radioStatus":"int,radio状态：1-开启，0-关闭",
                    "radioChannel":"int,radio信道",
                    "radioPower":"int,radio功率"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

AllItems.Return:
{
    "totalCount":"Number,本地AC总数",
    "leftCount":"Number,剩余数量",
    "localACList":[
        {
            "localACName":"String,本地AC名称",
            "localACSN":"String,本地AC序列号",
            "localACModel":"String,本地AC型号",
            "macAddr":"String,mac地址",
            "status":"Number,本地AC状态,1-在线,2-离线,3-版本下载",
            "ipv4Addr":"String,本地ACIPV4地址",
            "ipv6Addr":"String,本地ACIPV6地址",
            "controlIpv4Addr":"String,AP依附ACIPV4地址",
            "controlIpv6Addr":"String,AP依附ACIPV6地址",
            "location":"String,归属地，可能是未知的",
            "cntAPCount":"Number,关联AP数量",
            "onlineTime":"Number,在线时长",
            "runTime":"Number,本地AC设备运行时长",
            "bootVersion":"Number,boot版本号",
            "softVersion":"Number,版本号"
        }
    ]
}

            "apGroupName":"string,组名",
            "timeStamp":"int,时戳",
            "transmitTraffic":"double,上行流量",

            "transmitRate":"int,上行速率",
            "receiveRate":"int,下行速率",
